release.action: Works with latest post-beta2 Netbeans builds.

To maven.xml and plugin.jelly files added completion of plugin variables. The list is taken from the maven plugin cache. For each plugin the plugin.properties file is scanned to get the variable keys. Starts completing after "maven." is typed in any attribute value.
Upgraded to later version of Netbeans xml module, allowing better support for completing and constructing lists. eg. goal's tag prereqs attribute.
Dynamic tag libraries from maven plugins also supported.
A list of goals is now offered at appropriate places. Like pregoal tag's name attribute value.
.jelly extension is not by default recognized by Netbeans as xml file. Ask user at installation time.
